tool_description: 🎯 SEO Keyword Difficulty Checker: Your secret weapon in the digital marketing arsenal – aim high, rank higher!
name: SEO Keyword difficulty

api_list.name: Health check
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://seo-keyword-difficulty.p.rapidapi.com/health-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "seo-keyword-difficulty.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://seo-keyword-difficulty.p.rapidapi.com/health-check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "seo-keyword-difficulty.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Keyword difficulty
api_list.description: **⏱️ Request may take up to 20 secs, quality needs patience**. The keyword-difficulty endpoint offers a comprehensive analysis of how challenging it is to rank for specific keywords in search engine results pages (SERPs). Utilizing advanced algorithms, it provides a difficulty score ranging from 0 to 100, enabling marketers and SEO professionals to strategically select keywords that balance competitiveness with potential for ranking success. This tool is indispensable for optimizing content strategy and improving online visibility.
